title: Problem with Wi-Fi connectivity after Android 9 update
content: I have a Samsung Galaxy S8 and after the Android 9 update the connectivity with Wi-Fi started to fail, because when I'm connected to Wi-Fi with my phone I can't connect other devices and the phone connection it's not good because It down't allow me to surf on internet or watch videos on youtube and when I turn off the connectivity in the phone, all other devices work fine.
